      • SemsExecuteScript

        public int SemsExecuteScript​(java.lang.String inputScriptBuffer,
                             java.lang.String outputFilename,
                             ISemsAuthCallback semsAuthCallback)
                      throws SemsException
        Perform secure SEMS script execution synchronously
        inputScript : The Input secure script buffer in string format, fileName : Output response storage file name semsAuthCallback : Callback to be invoked for IAR User Auth
        Parameters:
        void -
        Returns:
        status 0 in SUCCESS, otherwise 1 in SEMS status Failed 2 in SEMS status Busy 3 in SEMS status denied 0x0f in Unknown error.
        Throws:
        SemsException

                                   throws SemsException
        Fetch output response APDU for SEMS script execution
        filename : File from current application space which stored SEMS script execution response

        Returns:
        stringResponse in string buffer.
        Throws:
        SemsException

      • GetLastSemsExecuteStatus

        public SemsGetLastExecStatus GetLastSemsExecuteStatus()
                                               throws SemsException
        Retrieve the last SEMS execution status by sending GET DATA command to SEMS applet
        Returns:
        SemsGetLastExecStatus object outScriptSignature : SEMS lib will provide the Authentication frame signature of the last executed script. Application can use this info to match with local SEMS script, useful in multiple application context. status: 0x00 - Success, The input script has been completely executed 0x01 - Failed, The input script execution was interrupted because of teardown
        Throws:
        SemsException

      • GetHashAlgorithm

        public java.lang.String GetHashAlgorithm()
                                  throws SemsException
        Get Hash type of the algorithm execution.
        Returns response SHAType to Application From SEMS
        Returns:
        Hash algorithm type used by SEMS script.
        Throws:
        SemsException

      • SetHashAlgorithm

        public int SetHashAlgorithm​(java.lang.String semsHashAlgoType)
                     throws SemsException
        Set Hash type of the algorithm execution.
        Set response SHAType to Application From SEMS
        Parameters:
        Hash - algorithm type used by SEMS to set
        Returns:
        status 0 in SUCCESS, otherwise SEMS_STATUS_HASH_INVALID in failure
        Throws:
        SemsException
